anya-e0807n0:10_0: Yā satti pāṇine yā ca, candra+kātyāyanādisu;
anya-e0807n0:12_0: Suttaṁ vutti ca teneva, katā ekena pañcikā;
anya-e0807n0:14_0: Tamhi ca dubbidhaṁ ñeyyaṁ, suttaṁ kammatthabhedato;
anya-e0807n0:19_0: Akārādayo niggahītantā tecattālīsakkharā vaṇṇā nāma honti.
anya-e0807n0:19_1: Taṁ yathā a, ā, i, ī, u, ū, e, ऐ, o, औ, ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṁ.
anya-e0807n0:19_3: Titālīsāti vacanaṁ katthaci vaṇṇalopaṁ ñāpeti, tena ‘‘paṭisaṅkhā yoniso’’tiādi siddhaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:20_0: Akāro ādi mariyādabhūto yesaṁ te aādayo.
anya-e0807n0:20_1: Tayo ca cattālīsa ceti titālīsa, iminā nipātanena vā catabhāgalopo.
anya-e0807n0:21_1: ‘‘kasmā ācariyakaccāyanādīhi viya ekacattālīsakkharāna+makkharasañña+makatvā titālīsakkharānaṁ vaṇṇasaññā katā’’ti. Vuccate –
anya-e0807n0:24_0: Vacanato māgadhikānaṁ ettha, seyyo, oṭṭho, sotthi-tyādīsupi asesabyāpikānaṁ titālīsakkharānaṁva ujukānvatthappakkharaguṇikā, neva pana ‘rukkhā vanaṁ’tyādo viya avayave samudāyavohāro, ‘samuddo mayā diṭṭho’tyādo viya ca samudāye avayavavohāroti dassetuṁ paccekaṁ vaṇṇasaññā katāti.
anya-e0807n0:25_0: ‘‘Sakkaccasavanaṁ buddhasāsanasampattī’’ti ‘‘sithiladhanitādi akkharavipattiyañhi atthassa dunnayatā hotī’’ti ca yasmā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:29_0: Tattha avaṇṇa+kavagga+hānaṁ kaṇṭho ṭhānaṁ, ivaṇṇa+cavagga+yānaṁ tālu, ṭavagga+ra+ḷānaṁ muddhā, tavagga+la+sānaṁ dantā, uvaṇṇa+pavaggānaṁ oṭṭho, e vaṇṇassa kaṇṭhatālū, o vaṇṇassa kaṇṭho+ṭṭhā, vakārassa danto+ṭṭhā, niggahītassa nāsikā, ṅa, ñña, ṇa, na, mānaṁ sakaṭhānaṁ nāsikā ca.
anya-e0807n0:32_0: Yathā avaṅhoti (avaṅa hoti., tañhi, taṇhā, pubbanho, amhe, guyhaṁ, gārayhā, ārulho, bahvakkharanti.
anya-e0807n0:38_1: saṁvutādikaraṇaviseso, saṁvutatta+makārassa, vivaṭattaṁ sesasarānaṁ sakāra+hakārānañca, phuṭṭhattaṁ vaggānaṁ, īsaṁphuṭṭhattaṁ ya+ra+la+vānaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:39_0: Evaṁ ṭhāna+karaṇa+payatana+suti kālabhinnesu akkharesu sarā nissayā, itare nissitā. Tattha –
anya-e0807n0:40_0: Nissayā+do sarā vuttā, nissitā byañjanā tato;
anya-e0807n0:44_0: Aādīsvā+dimhi niddiṭṭhā odantā dasa vaṇṇā sarā nāma honti.
anya-e0807n0:44_1: Yathā a ā, i ī, u ū, e ऐ, o औ.
anya-e0807n0:44_2: Saranti=sappadhānabhāvena pavattanti, byañjane vā sārentīti sarā.
anya-e0807n0:47_0: Aādīsvā+dimesu dasasu dve dve savaṇṇā nāma honti yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:47_1: Yathā a āiti, i īiti, u ū iti, e eiti, o, oiti.
anya-e0807n0:47_2: Samānā sadisā vaṇṇā savaṇṇā, samānattañca ṭhānato.
anya-e0807n0:49_0: Tesveva dasasu ye dve dve savaṇṇā, tesu yo yo pubbo, so so rassasañño hoti.
anya-e0807n0:49_1: Yathā a i u e o.
anya-e0807n0:49_2: Tesu ‘saṁyogato pubbāva dissanti dve panantimā’ta dassetuṁ tattha sādhuttā tesampi idha saṅgaho, yathā ettha seyyo oṭṭho sotthi.
anya-e0807n0:49_4: Rassakālo nāma accharāsaṅghāto akkhinimmilanasaṅkhāto vā kālo, tena ekamatto rasso, dvimatto dīgho, aḍḍhamatto byañjano.
anya-e0807n0:51_0: Aādīsvā+dibhūtesu dasasu ye dve dve savaṇṇā, tesu yo yo paro, so so dīghasañño hoti.
anya-e0807n0:51_1: Taṁ yathā ā ī ū e o.
anya-e0807n0:53_0: Aādīsu kādayo niggahītapariyantā tettiṁsa byañjanā nāma honti.
anya-e0807n0:53_1: Yathā ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṁ iti.
anya-e0807n0:56_0: Aādīsu kakārādayo makārantā pañcapañcakā vaggā nāma honti.
anya-e0807n0:56_1: Yathā ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma iti.
anya-e0807n0:56_4: Te pana paṭhamakkharavasena kavagga+cavaggādivohāraṁ gatā kusalattikādayo viya.
anya-e0807n0:58_0: Akārādīsva+yaṁ vaṇṇo bindumatto, so niggahītasañño hoti.
anya-e0807n0:58_1: Rassasaraṁ nissāya gahita+muccāritaṁ niggahītaṁ, karaṇaṁ niggahetvā vā.
anya-e0807n0:62_0: Vaṇṇā sarā savaṇṇā ca, rassā dīghā ca byañjanā;
anya-e0807n0:66_0: Loka aggapuggalo, paññā indriyaṁ, tīṇi imāni, no hi etaṁ, bhikkhunī ovādo, mātu upaṭṭhānaṁ, sametu āyasmā, abhibhū āyatanaṁ, dhanaṁ me atthi, sabbe eva, tayo assu dhammā, asanto ettha na dissanti itī+dha sarasaññāyaṁ –
anya-e0807n0:68_2: Lopo= adassanaṁ anuccāraṇaṁ , saroti jātyekavacanavasena vuttaṁ, sareti opasilesikādhārasattamī, tato vaṇṇa kāla byavadhāne kāriyaṁ na hoti, tva+masi, katamā cānanda aniccasaññāti.
anya-e0807n0:71_2: Lokaggapuggalo, paññindriyaṁ, tīṇimāni, no hetaṁ, bhikkhunovādo, mātupaṭṭhānaṁ, sametāyasmā, abhibhāyatanaṁ, dhanaṁmatthi, sabbeva, tayassu dhammā, asante+ttha na dissanti.
anya-e0807n0:71_3: Pubbassa kāriyavidhānā sattamīniddiṭṭhassa paratā+va gamyateti pareti paravacanampi ghaṭate.
anya-e0807n0:72_0: Yassa idāni, saññā iti, chāyā iva, iti api, assamaṇī asi, cakkhu indriyaṁ, akataññū asi, ākāse iva, te api, vande ahaṁ, so ahaṁ, cattāro ime, vasalo iti, moggallāno asi bījako, kathā eva kā, pāto evātī+dha pubbassaralope sampatte ‘‘saro lopo sare’’ tveva.
anya-e0807n0:74_0: Saramhā paro saro kvaci lopanīyo hoti.
anya-e0807n0:74_1: Yassa dāni, saññāti, chāyāva, itipi, assamaṇīsi, cakkhundriyaṁ, akataññūsi, ākāseva, tepi, vandehaṁ, sohaṁ, cattārome, vasa- lobhi , moggallānosi bījako, kathāva kā, pātova.
anya-e0807n0:74_2: Kvacīti kiṁ, paññindriyaṁ, pañcindriyāni, sattuttamo, ekūnavīsati, yassete, sugatovādo, diṭṭhāsavo, diṭṭhogho, cakkhāyatanaṁ, taṁ kutettha labbhā.
anya-e0807n0:74_3: ‘‘Vivakkhāto sandhayo bhavantī’’ti ñāyā vatticchāpi idha sijjhati.
anya-e0807n0:76_0: Tassa idaṁ, vāta īritaṁ, na upeti, vāma ūru, ati iva aññehi, vi udakaṁ itīdha pubbassaralope –
anya-e0807n0:78_0: Luttā sarā paresaṁ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ e+o honti vā yathākkamaṁ. Yathāsaṁkhyānuddeso samānānaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:80_0: Vaṇṇasaddo paro yasmā, tena savaṇṇopi gayhati sayañca rūpaṁti īūnampi e+o.
anya-e0807n0:80_1: Sabbattha rassassa jātiniddese dīghassāpi gahaṇatthaṁ ida+māraddhaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:80_2: Tassedaṁ, vāteritaṁ, nopeti, vāmoru, atevaññehi, vodakaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:80_3: Idañca pacchimodāharaṇadvayaṁ ‘‘avaṇṇe lutte eva e+o hontī’’ti gāhassa nisedhanatthaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:80_6: Pati urasminti vibhajja ‘‘yavā sare’’ti yakāre ‘‘tavaggavaraṇā’’dinā co, ‘‘vaggalasehi te’’ti pubbarūpañca, ‘‘yuvaṇṇāna+meo’’ti (yogavibhāgā) ussa o ca.
anya-e0807n0:80_7: Luttāti kiṁ, dasa ime dhammā, yathā idaṁ, kusalassa upasampadā.
anya-e0807n0:80_8: Atippasaṅgabādhakassa kvacisaddassānuvattanato na vikappavidhi niyatā, tena upeto, aveccāti evamādīsu vikappo.
anya-e0807n0:80_9: Tārakitā, yassindriyāni, mahiddhiko, sabbītiyo, tenupasaṅkami, lokuttarotiādīsu vidhi ca na hoti.
anya-e0807n0:81_0: Paṭisanthāravutti assa, sabbavitti anubhūyate, vi añjanaṁ, vi ākato, dāsī ahaṁ, ahuvā pure, anu addhamāsaṁ, anu eti, su āgataṁ, su ākāro, du ākāro, cakkhu āpāthaṁ, bahu ābādho, pātu akāsi, na tu eva, bhū āpanalānilaṁ itī+dha ‘‘yuvaṇṇānaṁ’’ ‘‘ve’’ti ca vattate,
anya-e0807n0:83_0: Sare pare ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ yakāra+vakārā honti vā yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:83_1: Paṭisanthāravutyassa, sabbavityanubhūyate, byañjanaṁ, byākato ‘‘byañjane dīgharassā’’ti dīghe dāsyāhaṁ, ahāpure, anvaddhamāsaṁ, anveti, svāgataṁ, svākāro, dvākāro, cakkhvāpāthaṁ, bahvābādho, pātvākāsi, na tveva, bhvāpanalānilaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:84_0: Adhigato kho me ayaṁ dhammo, putto te ahaṁ, te assa pahīnā pañca, te ahaṁ, ye assa, te ajja, yāvatako assa kāyo, tāvatako assa byāmo, ko attho, atha kho assa, ahaṁ kho ajja, so ahaṁ, so ajja, so eva, yato adhikaraṇaṁ, so ahaṁ itī+dha ‘‘yavā sare’’ ‘‘ve’’ti ca vattate,
anya-e0807n0:86_0: Eonaṁ yakāra+vakārā honti vā sare pare yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:86_1: ‘‘Byañjane dīgharassā’’ti dīghe adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo, putto tyāhaṁ, tyāssa pahīnā pañca, tyāhaṁ, yyassa, tyajja, yāvatakvassa kāyo, tāvatakvassa byāmo, kvattho, atha khvassa, ahaṁ khvajja, svāhaṁ, svajja, sveva, yatvādhikaraṇaṁ, svāhaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:86_3: Kvaci tveva, dhanamatthi, puttāmatthi, te nāgatā, asantettha, cattāro ime.
anya-e0807n0:87_0: Go eḷakaṁ, go assaṁ, go ajinaṁ itī+dha ‘‘sare’’ti vattate.
anya-e0807n0:89_1: Sa ca ‘‘ṭānubandhānekavaṇṇā sabbassā’’ti sabbassa pasaṅge ‘antassā’’ti vattate.
anya-e0807n0:91_0: Ṅa-kāro anubandho yassa, so anekavaṇṇopi antassa hotīti okārasseva hoti.
anya-e0807n0:91_2: Uccāritānantarappadhaṁsino hi anubandhā, payojanaṁ anubandhoti saṁketo.
anya-e0807n0:94_0: Evasadde pare itissa vo hoti vā. Sa ca –
anya-e0807n0:96_0: Chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭhassa yaṁ kāriyaṁ, ta+dantassa viññeyyanti ikārassā+deso.
anya-e0807n0:96_2: Aññatra yādeso, ‘‘tavaggavaraṇānaṁ ye cavaggabayañā’’ti tassa co, ‘‘vaggalasehi te’’ti yassa cakāro, icceva.
anya-e0807n0:97_0: Ti aṅgulaṁ,ti aṅgikaṁ, bhū ādayo, migī bhantā udikkhatityādisandhayo vuccante.
anya-e0807n0:99_0: Ete mayadā ca āgamā honti vā sare kvaci. Āgamino aniyamepi –
anya-e0807n0:102_0: Etthā+gamā aniyatāgamīnameva bhavanti ce, yakārāgameneva ‘‘nipajja’’nti siddhe ‘‘padādīnaṁ kvacī’’ti byañjanassa yukā+gamo niratthakoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0807n0:102_1: Tivaṅgulaṁ, tivaṅgikaṁ, bhūvādayo, migī bhantā vudikkhati, pavuccati, pāguññavujutā.
anya-e0807n0:102_4: Nirantaraṁ, nirālayo, nirindhano, nirīhakaṁ, niruttaro, nirojaṁ, duratikkamo, durāgataṁ, duruttaraṁ, pāturahosi, punarāgaccheyya, punaruttaṁ, punareva, punareti, dhīratthu, pātarāso, caturaṅgikaṁ, caturārakkhaṁ, caturiddhipādapaṭilābho, caturoghanittharaṇatthaṁ, bhatturatthe, vuttiresā, pathavīdhāturevesā , nakkhattarājāriva tārakānaṁ, vijjurivabbhakuṭe, āraggeriva sāsapo, usabhoriva, sabbhireva samāsetha.
anya-e0807n0:102_6: Lahumessati, gurumessati, idhamāhu, kena te idha mijjhati, bhadro kasāmiva, ākāse mabhipūjaye, ekamekassa, yena midhekacce.
anya-e0807n0:102_7: Bhātiyeva, hotiyeva, yathāyidaṁ, yathāyeva, māyidaṁ, nayidaṁ, nayidha, chayimāni, navayime dhammā, bodhiyāyeva, pathavīyeva dhātu, tesuyeva, teyeva, soyeva, pāṭiyekkaṁ, viyañjanaṁ, viyākāsi, pariyantaṁ, pariyādānaṁ, pariyuṭṭhānaṁ, pariyesati, pariyosānaṁ, niyāyogo.
anya-e0807n0:102_8: Udaggo, udayo, udāhaṭaṁ, udito, udīritaṁ, udeti, sakideva, kiñcideva, kenacideva, kismiñcideva, kocideva, sammadatto, sammadaññā vimuttānaṁ, sammadeva, yāvadatthaṁ, yāvadicchakaṁ, yāvadeva, tāvadeva, punadeva, yadatthaṁ, yadantaraṁ, tadantaraṁ, tadaṅgavimutti, etadatthaṁ, attadatthaṁ, tadatthaṁ, sadatthapasuto siyā, aññadatthu, manasādaññā vimuttānaṁ, bahudeva ratti.
anya-e0807n0:102_10: Vavatthitavibhāsattā vādhikārassa byañjanatopi, bhikkhunīnaṁ vuṭṭhāpeyya, ciraṁ nāyati, taṁyeva.
anya-e0807n0:103_0: Cha abhiññā, cha aṅgaṁ, cha asīti, cha aṁsā, cha āyatanaṁ itī+dha ‘‘vā sare’’ ‘‘āgamo’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0807n0:105_0: Chasaddā parassa sarassa ḷakāro āgamo hoti vā.
anya-e0807n0:107_0: Ādeso nāma so yā tu, asantuppatti āgamo.
anya-e0807n0:109_0: Kaññā iva, kaññāva iccādi sarasandhinisedho vuccati, pasaṅgapubbako hi paṭisedho.
anya-e0807n0:111_0: Pubbaparassarā dvepi vā kvaci na lupyante. Kaññā iva, kaññeva, kaññāva.
anya-e0807n0:112_0: Sāriputta idhekacco, ehi sivaka uṭṭhehi, āyasmā ānando, gāthā abhāsi, devā ābhassarā yathā, tevijjā iddhipattā ca, bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā, bhagavā eta+davoca, abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi, gantvā olokento, bhūtavādī atthavādī, yaṁ itthī arahaṁ assa, sāmāvatī āha, pāpakārī ubhayattha tappati, nadī ottharati, ye te bhikkhū appicchā, bhikkhū āmantesi, bhikkhū ujjhāyiṁsu, bhikkhū eva+māhaṁsu, imasmiṁ gāme ārakkhakā, sabbe ime, katame ekādasa, gambhīre odakantike, appamādo amataṁ padaṁ, saṅgho āgacchatu, ko imaṁ pathaviṁ vicessati, āloko udapādi, eko ekāya, cattāro oghā, are ahampi, sace imassa kāyassa, no atikkamo, aho acchariyo, atho anto ca, atha kho āyasmā, atho oṭṭhava+cittakā, tato ā- mantayi satthāti evamādayo idha kālabyavadhāneneva sijjhanti.
anya-e0807n0:112_1: Kvacīti kiṁ, āgatā+ttha, āgatā+mhā, katama+ssa vāro, appassutā+yaṁ puriso, camarī+va, sabbe+va, sve+va, ese+va nayo, parisuddhe+tthā+yasmanto, ne+ttha, kute+ttha labbhā, sace+sa brāhmaṇa, tathū+pamaṁ, yathā+ha, jīvhā+yatanaṁ, avijjo+gho, itthindriyaṁ, abhibhā+yatanaṁ, bhayatū+paṭṭhānaṁ, saddhī+dha vittaṁ purisassa seṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:113_0: Tatra abhirati, tatra ayaṁ, buddha anussati, sa atthikā, saññāvā assa, tadā ahaṁ, yāni idha bhūtāni, gacchāmi iti, ati ito, kikī iva, bahu upakāraṁ, madhu udakaṁ, su upadhāritaṁ, sopi ayaṁ, idāni ahaṁ, sace ayaṁ, appassuto ayaṁ, itara itarena, saddhā idha vittaṁ, kamma upanissayo, tathā upamaṁ, ratti uparato, vi upasamo, lokassa iti, deva iti, vi atipatanti, vi atināmenti, saṅghāṭi api, jīvitahetu api, vijju iva, kiṁsu idha vittaṁ, sādhu iti, te assa pahīnā, so assa, madhuvā maññati bālo, evaṁ gāme muni care, khanti paramaṁ tapo titikkhā, na maṁku bhavissāmi, su akkhāto, yo ahaṁ, so ahaṁ, kāmato jāyati soko, kāmato jāyati bhayaṁ, sakko uju ca suhujuca, anupaghāto, durakkhaṁ, duramaṁ, dubharatā.
anya-e0807n0:113_1: Yiṭṭhaṁ vā hutaṁ vā loke, yadi vā sāvake, puggalā dhammadasā te, bhovādī nāma so hoti, yathābhāvī guṇena so, yathā idaṁ, sammā dakkhāto, parā kamo, taṇhā kkhayo, jhānassa lābhī amhi, thullaccayo itī+dha –
anya-e0807n0:115_1: Tatrābhirati, tatrāyaṁ, buddhānussati, sātthikā, saññāvā+ssa, tadāhaṁ, yānī+dha bhūtāni, gacchāmīti, atīto, kikīva, bahūpakāraṁ, madhūdakaṁ, sūpadhāritaṁ, sopāyaṁ, idānāhaṁ, sacāyaṁ, appassutāyaṁ, itarītarena, saddhīdha vittaṁ, kammūpanissayo, tathūpamaṁ, rattūparato, vūpasamo, lokassāti, devāti, vītipatanti, vītināmenti, saṅghāṭīpi, jīvitahetūpi, vijjūva, kiṁsūdha vittaṁ, sādhūti, tyāssa pahīnā, svāssa, madhuvā maññatī bālo, evaṁ gāme munī care, khantī paramaṁ tapo titikkhā, na maṁkū bhavissāmi, svākkhāto, yvāhaṁ, svāhaṁ, kāmato jāyatī soko, kāmato jāyatī bhayaṁ, sakko ujū ca suhujū ca, anūpaghāto, dūrakkhaṁ, dūramaṁ, dūbharatā.
anya-e0807n0:115_2: Yiṭṭhaṁva hutaṁva loke, yadiva sāvake, puggala dhammadasā te, bhovādi nāma so hoti, yathābhāvi guṇena so, yathayidaṁ, sammadakkhāto, parakkamo, taṇhakkhayo, jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi, thullaccayo.
anya-e0807n0:115_3: Kvacīti kiṁ, tyajja, svassa, patiliyatīti dīghanisedho, māyidaṁ, manasādaññā vimuttānaṁ, yathākkamaṁ, ārakkhātītaṁ, dīyati, sūyatīti rassakāriyanisedho.
anya-e0807n0:118_0: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa kvaci dve rūpāni honti.
anya-e0807n0:118_1: Ettha ca āvuttidvivacanaṁ ṭhānedvivacananti dvīsu ṭhānedvivacanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:119_1: Idha pamādo=idhappamādo, evaṁ appamādo, vippayutto, suppasanno, sammā padhānaṁ=sammappadhānaṁ rassattaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:119_4: Pakkamo, paṭikkamo, hetukkamo, ākamati=akkamati, evaṁ pakkamati, yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:119_17: Ādisaddena avissajento, vissajento, abhikkantataro, pariccajento, upaddavo, upakkileso, mittadduno, āyabyayo, abbahi iccādi.
anya-e0807n0:121_0: Vatu+vaṭa+disāna+mante, yathā vattati, vaṭṭati, dassanaṁ, phasso iccādi.
anya-e0807n0:122_1: Ukaṁso=ukkaṁso, evaṁ dukkaraṁ, nikkaṅkho, uggataṁ, duccaritaṁ, nijjaṭaṁ, ujjahaṁ, uccaṅgaṁ, unnamati, dukkaro, niddaro, unnato, duppañño, nimmalo, uyyutto, dullabho, nibbatto, ussāho, nissāro.
anya-e0807n0:122_2: Takkaro, tajjo, tanninno, tappabhavo, tammayo, catukkaṁ, catuddisaṁ, catuppado, catubbidhaṁ, catussālaṁ, chakkaṁ, channavuti, chappadiko, chabbassāni.
anya-e0807n0:123_0: Apadantaākāravajjitadīghato yakārassa ca, niyyāti, suyyati, abhibhuyya, viceyya, vineyya, dheyyaṁ, neyyaṁ, seyyo, jeyyo, veyyākaraṇo.
anya-e0807n0:124_0: Chandānurakkhaṇe-nappajahe vaṇṇabalaṁ purāṇaṁ, ujjugatesu seyyo, gacchanti suggatiṁ.
anya-e0807n0:124_2: Kvacitveva, nikāyo, nidānaṁ, nivāso, tato, chasaṭṭhi, upanīyati, sūyati.
anya-e0807n0:126_0: Catutthadutiyesu paresve+saṁ catutthadutiyānaṁ tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamā honti paccāsatyā.
anya-e0807n0:126_1: Vagge gha+jha+ḍha+dha+bhā catutthā, kha+cha+ṭha+tha+phā dutiyā, ga+ja+ḍa+da+bā tatiyā, ka+ca+ṭa+ta+pā paṭhamā.
anya-e0807n0:126_2: Pa+u+du-niādīhi paresaṁ ghādīnaṁ dvibhāve tatiyapaṭhamā honti.
anya-e0807n0:126_7: Vibbhanto, ubbhanto, samubbhanto, dubbhikkhaṁ, nibbhayaṁ, tabbhāvo, catubbhi.
anya-e0807n0:127_0: Rassasarehi paresaṁ vaggadutiyānaṁ dvibhāvo ce, paṭhamā.
anya-e0807n0:127_1: Pañcakkhandhā, evaṁ rūpakkhandho, akkhamo, abhikkhaṇaṁ, avikkhepo, jātikkhettaṁ, dhātukkhobho, āyukkhayo.
anya-e0807n0:127_2: Setacchattaṁ, evaṁ sabbacchannaṁ, vicchannaṁ, bodhicchāyā, jambucchāyā, samucchedo.
anya-e0807n0:127_3: Tatra ṭhito=tatraṭṭhito, evaṁ thalaṭṭhaṁ, jalaṭṭhaṁ, aṭṭhitaṁ, niṭṭhitaṁ, cattāriṭṭhānāni, garuṭṭhāniyo, samuṭṭhito.
anya-e0807n0:127_4: Sabbatthāmena, yasatthero, pattharati, vitthāro, abhitthuto, vitthambhito, anutthunaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:127_5: Papphoṭeti, mahapphalaṁ, anipphalaṁ, vipphāro, paripphuṭeyya, madhupphāṇitaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:127_6: Ākārato, ākhāto=akkhāto, evaṁ taṇhākkhayo, āṇākkhettaṁ, saññākkhandho.
anya-e0807n0:127_7: Āchādayi=acchādayi, evaṁ acchindati, nāvaṭṭhaṁ, attharati, apphoṭeti.
anya-e0807n0:127_8: Kvaci tveva, puvakhajjakaṁ, tassa chaviādīni chinditvā, yathāṭhitaṁ, kammaphalaṁ, sīlaṁ tassa jhāyino, ye jhānappasutā dhīrā, nidhanaṁ, mahādhanaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:128_0: Akaramha se te, so kho byanti kāhiti, so gacchaṁ na nivattati, eso attho, eso ābhogo, eso idāni itī+dha ‘‘ve’’ti vattate.
anya-e0807n0:130_0: Eonaṁ vaṇṇe kvaci a hoti vā.
anya-e0807n0:130_1: Akaramha sa te, akaramha se te, evaṁ sa kho byanti kāhiti, sa gacchaṁ na nivattati, esa attho , esa ābhogo, esa idāni.
anya-e0807n0:130_2: Vaṇṇeti kiṁ, amoghavacano ca so, gandhabbānaṁ adhipati, mahārājā yasassi soti.
anya-e0807n0:130_3: ‘‘Na sandhisamāsā vaddhassā’’ti vuttattā gāthāmajjhe sandhi na hotīti ‘‘tividhassā’’ti vuttatimhi parepi vaṇṇo paro nāma na iti.
anya-e0807n0:131_0: Ata yantaṁ, tatha yaṁ, mada yaṁ, budha yati, dhana yaṁ, seva yo, para yesanā, pokkharaṇa yo itī+dha –
anya-e0807n0:133_2: Accantaṁ, tacchaṁ, majjaṁ, bujjhati, dhaññaṁ, sebbo, payyesanā, pokkharañño.
anya-e0807n0:133_3: Apuccaṇḍakāyaṁ, jaccandho, yajjevaṁ, ajjhagamā, ajjhattaṁ, ajjhupagato, ajjhogāhetvā, dibbaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:134_0: Saka yate, ruca yate, paca yate, aṭa yate, lupa yate, kupa yate, sala yate, phala yate, disa yate, asa yate itī+dha ‘‘ye’’ti vattate vakkhamānesu dvīsu.
anya-e0807n0:136_0: Vaggalasehi parassa yakārassa kvaci te vaggalasā honti.
anya-e0807n0:136_1: Sakkate, ruccate, paccate, aṭṭate, luppate, kuppate, sallate, phallate, dissate, assate.
anya-e0807n0:139_0: Hassa vipallāso hoti yakāre. Muyhati, guyhati.
anya-e0807n0:140_0: Bahu ābādho itī+dha ussavakāre ‘‘hassa vipallāso’’ti vattate.
anya-e0807n0:142_0: Hassa vipallāso hoti vā vakāre. Bavhābādho. Vātveva, bahvābādho.
anya-e0807n0:144_1: Dukkataṁ=dukkaṭaṁ, evaṁ sukaṭaṁ, patthaṭo, pataṭo, uddhaṭo, visaṭo.
anya-e0807n0:144_3: Paṇidhānaṁ, paṇipāto, paṇāmo, paṇītaṁ, pariṇato, pariṇāmo, duṇṇayo, niṇṇayo, oṇato.
anya-e0807n0:144_4: Paripanno=palipanno, evaṁ palibodho, pallaṅkaṁ, taluno, mahāsālo, māluto, sukhumālo.
anya-e0807n0:145_0: Cakkhu udapādi, akkhi rujati, purima jāti, aṇu thūlāni, kattabba kusalaṁ bahuṁ, ta sampayuttā, tata sabhāvato itī+dha ‘‘ve’’ti vattate yāva ‘‘mayadā sare’’ti.
anya-e0807n0:147_4: Cakkhuṁ udapādi, akkhiṁ rujati, purimaṁ jāti, aṇuṁ thūlāni, kattabbaṁ kusalaṁ bahuṁ, taṁsampayuttā, taṁtaṁsabhāvato.
anya-e0807n0:147_7: vavatthitavibhāsattā vādhikārassa, vavatthitassa lakkhaṇassā+nurodhena lakkhaṇe pavattitā vibhāsā vavatthitavibhāsā.
anya-e0807n0:147_8: Vāsaddo hi atthadvaye vattate katthaci vikappe, katthaci yathāvavatthitarūpapariggaheti.
anya-e0807n0:147_9: Yadā pacchime, tadā nicca+manicca+masantañca vidhiṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0807n0:147_10: Ettha pana kvacisaddassā+nuvattanā tenevā+santavidhi siddhoti vāsaddeni+taradvayaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:147_11: Kvaci tveva, na hi etehi, idha ceva.
anya-e0807n0:148_0: Saṁ rambho, saṁ ratto, saṁ rāgo, tāsaṁ ahaṁ santike, evaṁ ayaṁ, puṁ liṅgaṁ, kiṁ ahaṁ, tassa adāsiṁ ahaṁ itī+dha ‘‘niggahītā’’dhikāro ā ‘‘mayadā sare’’ti.
anya-e0807n0:150_1: Dīghe sārambho saṁrambho, sāratto saṁratto, sārāgo saṁrāgo, pubbassaralope tāsāhaṁ santike, evāyaṁ, dvitte pulliṅgaṁ puṁliṅgaṁ, kyāhaṁ, tassa adāsahaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:150_2: Paṭisallāno, sallekho, pātukāmo, gantumano, ariyasaccāna dassanaṁ, etaṁ buddhāna sāsanaṁ, avisāhāro, cirappavāsintiādīsu niccaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:150_3: Kvacīti kiṁ, eva+mayaṁ, ki+mahaṁ, etaṁ maṅgala+muttamaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:151_0: Kataṁ iti, abhinanduṁ iti, uttattaṁ iva, cakkaṁ iva, kaliṁiva, halaṁ idāni, kiṁ idāni, tvaṁ asi, idaṁ api, uttariṁ api, dātuṁ api, sadisaṁ eva itī+dha –
anya-e0807n0:153_0: Niggahītamhā parasarassa lopo hoti vā kvaci.
anya-e0807n0:153_1: Katanti, abhinandunti, uttattaṁva, cakkaṁva, kaliṁva, halaṁdāni, kiṁdāni, tvaṁsi, idampi, uttarimpi, dātumpi, sadisaṁva.
anya-e0807n0:153_2: Vāti kiṁ, kataṁiti, kimiti, dātumapi, sadisaṁ eva.
anya-e0807n0:154_0: Pupphaṁ assā uppajjati, evaṁ assa te āsavā itī+dha parassaralope –
anya-e0807n0:156_0: Abyavahitānaṁ dvinnaṁ byañjanānaṁ ekatra ṭhiti saṁyogo, tasmiṁ saṁyoge yo ādibhūtāvayavo, tassa vā kvaci lopo hotītiādibyañjanassa lopo.
anya-e0807n0:156_2: Tiṇṇaṁ saṁyogānaṁ visaye agyāgāraṁ, vutyassa iti hoti.
anya-e0807n0:157_0: Taṁ karoti, taṁ khaṇaṁ, saṁ gato, taṁ ghataṁ, dhammaṁ care, taṁ channaṁ, taṁ jātaṁ, taṁ jhānaṁ, taṁ ñāṇaṁ, taṁ ṭhānaṁ, taṁ ḍahati, taṁ tanoti, taṁ thiraṁ, taṁ dānaṁ, taṁ dhanaṁ, taṁ niccutaṁ, taṁ patto, taṁ phalaṁ, tesaṁ bodho, saṁ bhūto, taṁ mittaṁ, kiṁ kato, dātuṁ gato itī+dha –
anya-e0807n0:159_0: Niggahītassa kho vagge vagganto vā hotīti nimittānussarānaṁ paccāsatyā tabbaggapañcamo hoti.
anya-e0807n0:159_1: Paccāsatti nāma ṭhānato āsannatā guṇato vā, guṇatoti vaṇṇasaññādiguṇato.
anya-e0807n0:159_2: Niggahītassa anusarīyatīti pacchā katvā sarīyatīti anussarotipi vuccati.
anya-e0807n0:159_3: Taṅkaroti=taṁ karoti, evaṁ taṅkhaṇaṁ, saṅgato, taṅghataṁ.
anya-e0807n0:159_6: Tantanoti, tanthiraṁ, tandānaṁ, tandhanaṁ, tanniccutaṁ, tampatto, tamphalaṁ, tesammodho, sambhūto, tammittaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:159_7: Kiṅkato, dātuṅgato, taṇhaṅkaro, raṇañjaho, saṇṭhito, jutindharo, sammatotiādīsu niccaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:160_0: Ānantarikaṁ ya+māhu, yaṁ yadeva, paccattaṁ eva, taṁ hiitī+dha –
anya-e0807n0:162_2: Ānantarikañña+māhu=ānantarikaṁ ya+māhu, yaññadeva=yaṁyadeva, ñassa dvitte paccattaññeva, paccattaṁ eva, tañhi, tañhi.
anya-e0807n0:162_3: ‘‘Abyabhicārinā byabhicārī niyamyate’’ti ñāyā evasaddasahacariyā ‘‘ya’’ iti sabbādiyasaddasseva gahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:165_0: Saṁsaddassa yaṁ niggahītaṁ, tassa vā ño hoti yakāre.
anya-e0807n0:165_3: Saṁssāti kiṁ, etaṁ yojanaṁ, taṁ yānaṁ, taṁ saraṇaṁ yanti.
anya-e0807n0:166_0: Taṁ eva, taṁ ahaṁ brūmi, yaṁ āhu, dhanaṁ eva, kiṁ etaṁ, nindituṁ arahati, taṁ idaṁ, yaṁ aniccaṁ, taṁ anattā, etaṁ avoca, etaṁ eva itī+dha –
anya-e0807n0:168_0: Niggahītassa ma ya dā honti vā sare kvaci.
anya-e0807n0:168_1: Tameva taṁ eva, tamahaṁ brūmi=taṁ ahaṁ brūmi, yamāhu, dhanameva, kimetaṁ, ninditumarahati. Tayidaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:170_1: ‘‘Ya+dalakkhaṇikaṁ, taṁ nipātanā’’ti ñāyā lakkhaṇantarena avihitā desa+lopā+gama+vipallāsā, sabbattha imināva daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0807n0:170_4: Issa akāre taṁ iminā=tadaminā, sakiṁ āgāmī=sakadāgāmī, dhassa dakāre ekaṁ idha ahaṁ=eka+midā+haṁ, vidhassa vidādeso saṁvidhāya avahāro=saṁvidāvahāro, vārisaddassa vakāre, hassa lakāre ca kate vārivāhako=valāhako, jīvanassa jīādeso, jīvanassa muto=jīmūto.
anya-e0807n0:170_5: Chavassa suādese, sayanassa sānādese ca kate chavassa sayanaṁ=susānaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:170_6: Uddhassa uduādese, khassa khalaādese ca ‘‘saramhā dve’’ti dvittādimhi ca kate uddhaṁ khaṁ assa udukkhalaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:170_7: Pisitassa piādese, asassa sācādese ca kate pisitāso=pisāco.
anya-e0807n0:171_0: Mahīsaddassa mayūādese, ravatissa rādese ca kate mahiyaṁ ravatīti mayūro.
anya-e0807n0:176_3: Mehanassa khassa mālā mekhalāti vaṇṇalopo, ha+na+makārānaṁ lopo.
anya-e0807n0:177_1: ‘‘Jaraggavā vicintesuṁ, vara+mhākaṁ bhusāmive’’ti ettha ivasaddo evakārattho.
